title: King’s Quest – Ch. 1
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, German.  Download King’s Quest – Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember, the first part of a five-chapter game series that boldly reimagines one of gaming’s most groundbreaking franchises. An aging King Graham reflects on a life of adventure with his granddaughter, Gwendolyn, taking players back to his teen years and his quest to become a knight of Daventry in King Edward’s royal guard. Discover a wondrous world full of whimsical characters, charming puzzles and perilous dangers in this fun and enchanting coming of age story.  © 2015 Activision Publishing, Inc.  SIERRA, SIERRA with mountain design and KING’S QUEST are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. Purchasing and using the software constitutes acceptance of the software license agreement available at support.activision.com/license

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - "A Hand Painted Game" Behind The Scenes Trailer
childDownloads.description: King’s Quest: "A Hand Painted Game” is the third installment of our four-part series taking you behind the scenes of King’s Quest with Art Director Evan Cagle and Producer Lindsey Rostal of The Odd Gentlemen to see how the artwork is born on page before coming to life on screen. Creating a fantastic but compelling world true to the spirit of King’s Quest required going back to the lessons of old. Beginning with 1990’s King’s Quest V, Sierra devised a way for its artists to draw out their ideas in vivid color and detail before scanning them into the game for further polishing. Now, 25 years later, the team is employing a similar technique to give this incredible reimagining of a classic tale the truly stunning storybook look it deserves.

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - Accolades Trailer
childDownloads.description: Gamers and critics alike love King's Quest Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember, a charming reimagining of one of the most treasured names in the adventure games genre. Join in the celebration with this new gameplay trailer! For more information, visit www.sierra.com.

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - Ch. 2: Rubble Without A Cause Announce Trailer
childDownloads.description: King’s Quest - Rubble Without A Cause is the second of five chapters in the new, critically acclaimed reimagining of the classic King’s Quest game series. In this latest adventure, King Graham takes players back to his first test as ruler of Daventry. When a mischievous horde of goblins takes his kingdom hostage, a newly crowned & woefully unprepared Graham must rise up to free his people & prove himself the leader he was destined to become.

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - Chapter 2: Rubble Without A Cause
childDownloads.description: If you already own King’s Quest: The Complete Collection or Season Pass, DO NOT repurchase this content here or you will be charged again. Please download new chapters from within the game. King’s Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember is required to play this content & is sold separately.  King’s Quest - Rubble Without A Cause is the second of five chapters in the new, critically acclaimed reimagining of the classic King’s Quest game series. In this latest adventure, King Graham takes players back to his first test as ruler of Daventry. When a mischievous horde of goblins takes his kingdom hostage, a newly crowned & woefully unprepared Graham must rise up to free his people & prove himself the leader he was destined to become.  Will Graham & his friends unearth a way to escape their rock-brained captors? Will he take for granite everything he learned as an adventurer? Does he have the stones to reclaim his mantle & lead his kingdom to safety? Will the hat make it out ok?

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb
childDownloads.description: If you already own King’s Quest(TM): The Complete Collection or Season Pass, DO NOT repurchase this content here or you will be charged again. Please download new chapters from within the game. King’s Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember is required to play this content & is sold separately.  King’s Quest – Once Upon a Climb is the third chapter in the new, critically-acclaimed reimagining of the classic King’s Quest game series. In his latest adventure, King Graham recounts his most personal tale yet. When the magic mirror reveals the location of his one-true love, Graham must climb to daring new heights to save his future Queen. But what he encounters there might just send his notions of romance sailing out the window.  Will Graham finally meet his match? Will it be love at first height? Will love-sickness have Graham seeing double? And when did he have time to go to the gym?

childDownloads.title: King's Quest - "Voicing a Modern Classic" Behind The Scenes Trailer
childDownloads.description: King’s Quest: “Voicing a Modern Classic” is the second installment in our four-part series revealing the headlining talent at the heart of bringing King’s Quest™ to life.  Talent includes veterans Christopher Lloyd and Wallace Shawn as well as Josh Keaton, Maggie Elizabeth Jones and Zelda Williams.  In “Voicing a Modern Classic” find out what they have to say about voicing one of gaming's most memorable franchises.

childDownloads.title: King’s Quest Compatibility Pack 1
childDownloads.description: This free compatibility pack enables King’s Quest: Chapter 1 to work seamlessly with Chapters 2-5 and the Epilogue. Please note, this download and King’s Quest Compatibility Pack 2 are required to play the subsequent Chapters but do not allow you to play the Chapters you have not downloaded or purchased.

childDownloads.title: King’s Quest™: Season Pass
childDownloads.description: King’s Quest: Season Pass gives you access to all remaining chapters (2-5) for the best value!  King’s Quest is a collection of 5 chapter releases, each focusing on an untold tale in Graham’s past. Embark on an extraordinary journey across the world of Daventry, full of whimsical characters, charming puzzles and perilous dangers.   © 2015 Activision Publishing, Inc.  SIERRA, SIERRA with mountain design and KING’S QUEST are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. Purchasing and using the software constitutes acceptance of the software license agreement available at support.activision.com/license  You must purchase and download King’s Quest – Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember to play King’s Quest: Season Pass, sold separately.  Content in King’s Quest: Season Pass may be sold separately. If you purchase the Season Pass or the Complete Collection, do not also purchase the standalone chapters, as you will be charged for them. Chapters 2-5 will be made available through 2015 and 2016.
